PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-15471999-08-270HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of DAVID C. COLVILLE, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; designation of DAVID C. COLVILLE as a representative of the Atlantic region and determination that he shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Atlantic regional office; and designation of DAVID C. COLVILLE as Vice-Chairman of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during pleasure; effective January 1, 2000.
Attachments
